snippet.title: Gloomy Juncture - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam
🔗 https://gloomyjuncture.com

Embark on the haunting tale of Gloomy Juncture.

A single gunshot shatters the silence, setting the wheels of fate in motion.
Step into the shoes of a mundane person, entangled in the aftermath of this pivotal moment. Fate and consequence collide, building towards a climactic finale.

Gloomy Juncture invites you to embark on a mesmerizing adventure that blends gripping storytelling, immersive exploration, and challenging puzzle-solving, all within its unique hand-drawn world.

🔗 https://twitter.com/SubtalesStudio
🔗 https://www.instagram.com/filipe_subtales.studio/
🔗 https://www.reddit.com/user/SubOathshot

00:00 Intro
00:10 Puzzles and Riddles
00:25 Environmental Puzzles
00:44 Fully Voice Acted
00:57 Dynamic Narration
01:12 Fully Hand-Drawn
01:19 Useless Features...
01:33 Ending
01:55 Wishlist on Steam

---
#GloomyJuncture #indiegamedev #solodev #handdrawn #adventuregame #unity3d #SubtalesStudio
